CustomField.description: Warning indicator when Products total does not match ACV. Empty when aligned or no products.
CustomField.formula: IF( Amount > 0 && ACV__c > 0 && Amount != ACV__c, "⚠️ Products ($" & TEXT(ROUND(Amount/1000, 0)) & "K) ≠ ACV ($" & TEXT(ROUND(ACV__c/1000, 0)) & "K)", IF( Amount > 0 && Amount = ACV__c, "✓ Aligned", "" ) )
CustomField.label: ACV / Products Status
